Article Title: IND U-19 vs ENG U-19 ODI: England beat India in fifth match; how did 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi fare?
Article Text:
Vaibhav Suryavanshi of India (Photo by Michael Steele/Getty Images)

Inside Edgbaston: A Complete Stadium Tour

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll How do you rate India's overall performance in the U-19 series? Excellent Good Average Poor

India‚Äôs U-19 team wrapped up their one-day tour in England on a disappointing note, falling to a dominant seven-wicket defeat in the fifth and final Youth ODI on Monday.Despite the loss, all eyes remained on 14-year-old sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi, who scored a fighting 33, keeping fans intrigued after his record-breaking hundred earlier in the series.Having already sealed the five-match series 3-1 with a commanding 55-run win in the fourth ODI, India rested key players and shuffled the lineup. But their batting faltered after electing to bat first in Worcester.Skipper Ayush Mhatre (1) and Vihaan Malhotra (1) fell cheaply within the first three overs, leaving India tottering at 9 for 2.Suryavanshi then stepped up with a composed 33 off 42 balls, striking three fours and two sixes.He stitched together a vital 51-run stand with Rahul Kumar (21) that helped stabilise the innings briefly. However, Suryavanshi perished trying to accelerate, caught by Alex Green off Sebastian Morgan.Middle-order batters struggled to convert starts, with Harvnash Pangalia (24), Kanishk Chauhan (24), and Deepesh Devendran (0) falling in quick succession.RS Ambrish was the lone standout, scoring a resilient 66 off 81 balls, anchoring the innings with six boundaries.India eventually posted 210 for 9 in their 50 overs, a total that proved inadequate on a batting-friendly surface.In reply, England made light work of the chase. Ben Mayes led the charge with an unbeaten 82, supported by BJ Dawkins‚Äôs explosive 66 and skipper Thomas Rew‚Äôs unbeaten 49 off just 37 balls.England reached the target in just 31.1 overs, winning with 113 balls to spare.Naman Pushpak took 2 wickets for India, but the visitors were thoroughly outplayed as England ended the series on a high note.
Article Summary: India's u-19 team lost to england in the fifth and final youth odi in worcester. England won by seven wickets to seal the series 3-1. Vaibhav suryavanshi scored 33, but india's batting faltered.

Article Title: Dayton Bramhall: Cut Twice Despite ‚ÄúDoing Everything Right‚Äù‚ÄîIs Dallas Cowboys Cheerleader Selection Biased?
Article Text:
Dayton Bramhall faced repeated rejections despite multiple auditions (Image via her IG)

A legacy with something to prove returns for a third try at DCC

Emotional fallout, a strained friendship, and a quiet comeback

Dayton Bramhall's journey with the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders has been anything but easy ‚Äî and her story has become one of the most emotional arcs in Season 2 of Netflix's America‚Äôs Sweethearts: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders. A third-time auditionee and daughter of longtime DCC associate choreographer Shelly Bramhall, Dayton came into the 2024 training camp with the weight of a legacy and the pressure to finally make the team. But after once again being cut, the young dancer made a decision that would redefine her identity beyond the DCC brand.Raised in McKinney, Texas, Dayton Bramhall has been immersed in the world of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders her entire life. Her mother, Shelly, was part of the DCC class of 1989 and has served as a key figure on the staff for years. That connection, however, didn‚Äôt secure Dayton a spot. ‚ÄúNone of us want you to make this team just because you have a history,‚Äù director Kelli Finglass told her bluntly. ‚ÄúYou need to earn to make this team. ‚ÄùDespite showing improvement and passion during her audition, Bramhall struggled with memorizing choreography and keeping up with the precision and power expected at the elite level.‚ÄúThere‚Äôs one that just won‚Äôt stick in my body, but I‚Äôll get it,‚Äù she said during training camp. Unfortunately, the veterans didn‚Äôt believe she was ready ‚Äî and Finglass ultimately told her it would be a ‚Äúdisservice to have you make this team and the struggle be all year. ‚ÄùWhile Dayton Bramhall took the cut with grace, the decision left ripples in her personal life. Her mother Shelly admitted, ‚ÄúThat was hard because we were friends. If anything, I wasn‚Äôt hurt by her not making it, I was way more hurt by Kelli and Judy.‚Äù Despite the tension, Dayton chose to tell her mom herself, showing maturity beyond her years.Bramhall returned in 2025 for another shot ‚Äî but was cut again before training camp. In a heartfelt comment on TikTok, Dayton wrote, ‚ÄúI did EVERYTHING they asked of me and tried my absolute best to fit their mold. I‚Äôm not wanted there and I‚Äôm hoping this takes me to where I truly belong.‚ÄùAlso Read: Where is Armani Latimer now? Inside the former Dallas Cowboys Cheerleader‚Äôs life after season 2 retirement and alopecia advocacy Now a teacher at The Young Company in Texas, Dayton is using her journey to empower young dancers. Her story is one of resilience, self-discovery, and redefining success on her own terms. As her mom put it best, ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs stronger for doing so, even if the results weren‚Äôt in her favor. God has something better for her.‚Äù
Article Summary: Dayton bramhall is one of the stars of netflix's america's sweethearts: dallas cowboys cheerleaders. Her mother, shelly, was part of the dcc class of 1989 and has served as a key figure on the staff for years. Bramhall returned in 2025 for another shot ‚Äî but was cut again before training camp.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI've been giving him little hints‚Äù- Larsa Pippen drops massive update about her big day with new beau Jeff Coby
Article Text:
Larsa Pippe, Image via Getty

Larsa Pippen shares a massive update about her big day with new boyfriend Jeff Coby

More than a basketball wife! Larsa Pippen Unfiltered!

The personal life of former NBA star Scottie Pippen‚Äôs ex-wife, Larsa Pippen, has always made headlines. From being married to Scottie Pippen for more than a decade to dating NBA legend Michael Jordan‚Äôs son Marcus Jordan, the Real Housewives of Miami star has been a tabloid favorite for a long time. During a recent interview with the media outlet People, Larsa Pippen poured her heart out while talking about the new man in her life, Jeff Coby. In between the conversation, the popular reality television celebrity went on to share intimate details about her big day.Despite being in the spotlight due to her romantic relationships, former NBA star Scottie Pippen‚Äôs ex-wife never fails to try her luck in love. The 51-year-old reality television star has found love again with 31-year-old professional basketball athlete Jeff Coby. During a recent interview with the media outlet People, Larsa opened up on her genuine feelings towards Coby. While talking about her future plans with Jeff Coby, Pippen went on to reveal a massive update about her big day, including the size of her engagement ring. She said,‚ÄúI feel like we're on a really good path right now. We get along with everything. He's been asking me what shaped stones I like, so I've been giving him little hints.‚ÄùWhile talking about the size of her engagement ring, Larsa Pippen further revealed‚ÄúWe haven't really talked about the size, but we just talked about [how] I like the brilliant cut or an oval. I feel like those are really cute.‚ÄùWhile talking about what actually made her fall for Jeff, she recalled‚Äî‚ÄúThe other day, I FaceTimed him when he was at his parents' house, and he was teaching his niece how to multiply, and I thought, ‚ÄòThat is so sweet. That's why this is my guy, because he's just so family-oriented and just so kind, and I just feel like he's my guy. He just has all the qualities that I really love.‚ÄùReportedly, the duo started dating each other in 2025. As Jeff Coby is a basketball athlete, Larsa Pippen even revealed that she was quite happy to see her beau with ex-husband Scottie Pippen. The former NBA star Scottie Pippen and Larsa separated in 2021 and share four kids Scotty Jr., Preston, Justin and Sophia. The eldest son Scotty Pippen Jr. would be representing the Memphis Grizzlies for the upcoming NBA season.Also Read: ‚ÄúWants me to F**king retire‚Äù-LeBron James's leaked chat with former teammate reveals the true reason behind his future NBA retirement
Article Summary: Larsa pippen has found love again with 31-year-old professional basketball athlete jeff coby. The real housewives of miami star has been a tabloid favorite for a long time. Larsa opened up on her genuine feelings towards coby in a recent interview.

Article Title: Where is the 2025 Amundi Evian Championship being played at Evian Resort Golf Club in France
Article Text:
Where is the 2025 Amundi Evian Championship being played at Evian Resort Golf Club in France (Image via Getty)

What makes Evian Resort Golf Club a top major venue



How to watch the 2025 Amundi Evian Championship live



Curious where one of the LPGA majors is taking place this year? The 2025 Amundi Evian Championship tees off at the breathtaking Evian Resort Golf Club. Nestled by Lake Geneva in √âvian‚Äëles‚ÄëBains, France, this course brings major history, stunning views, and a real test of golf skills. It will run from July 10 to 13, and every swing will echo across the Alps.Evian Resort Golf Club has held the event since its start as the Evian Masters in 1994. It became an LPGA major in 2013 and now serves as the fourth major of the season. The 18‚Äëhole, par‚Äë71 layout stretches 6,333 yards and sits about 480 meters above sea level.Between 2012 and 2013, the club invested $8 million to update its tees, bunkers, fairways, and greens with the help of Steve Smyers and European Golf Design. The result? A striking course that challenges players with unpredictable breaks and Alpine winds . Though some pros call it tricky, its beauty by Lake Geneva remains legendary .The tournament runs from July 10 to 13, 2025 . In the U.S., Golf Channel will air Thursday and Friday from 6 to 11 a.m. ET, with NBC offering live coverage noon to 1 p.m. ET those days.Weekend play continues on Golf Channel from 4 to 10 a.m. ET. For fans streaming, NBC Sports App and GolfChannel.com will have live feeds.International viewers can access coverage based on region through LPGA Live.Also Read: Al Jazira star Mohamed Elneny‚Äôs secret second marriage to Hanan goes viral after fans spot Instagram clues With its alpine beauty and remarkable ancestry, the Evian Resort Golf Club presents an ideal balance of challenge and allure. At one of the most beautiful stages in all of golf, the fresh champions of the Amundi Evian Championship 2025 may be anointed.
Article Summary: The 2025 amundi evian championship tees off at the breathtaking evian resort golf club in france. The 18‚Äëhole, par‚Äë71 layout stretches 6,333 yards and sits about 480 meters above sea level. In the u.s. golf channel will air thursday and friday from 6 to 11 a.m. Et.

Article Title: NFL Top 100 2025: Quinnen Williams and Andrew Van Ginkel break into list after phenomenal 2024 seasons
Article Text:
Quinnen Williams (via Getty Images)

New York Jets' Quinnen Williams and Minnesota Vikings' Andrew Van Ginkel come in at No. 87 and No. 88 on esteemed NFL list



New York Jets defensive tackle Quinnen Williams and Minnesota Vikings linebacker Andrew Van Ginkel have been recognized for their outstanding performances in the 2024 NFL season, both landing places on the NFL Top 100 list in 2025. QuinnenWilliams ranked No. 87, while Andrew Van Ginkel ranked immediately behind him at No. 88.The ballot, cast by fellow players, is one of the league's most highly regarded rankings of on-field performance, and both defenders won their spots through gritty reliability, standout statistics, and leadership on underperforming and high-functioning teams alike.The New York Jets might have experienced another forgettable 2024 campaign, going 5-12 and stretching their drought to 14 years without the playoffs, but Quinnen Williams was still one of the team's few silver linings. Even with fighting the pull of a nagging hamstring injury, the veteran defensive tackle played 16 games and put up a decent line: 37 total tackles, eight tackles for loss, six sacks, and his third straight Pro Bowl selection.Quinnen Williams' sustained greatness arrives with newfound optimism under new head coach Aaron Glenn in 2025 to finally bring competitive football to New York. A whole season healthy after dominating as the 2022 First-Team All-Pro could be the Jets' long-awaited turnaround turning point.Andrew Van Ginkel's presence helped to make Minnesota a defensive force to be reckoned with. The Vikings were second against the run (93.4 yards per game allowed) and fifth in points surrendered (19.5) in their 14-3 regular season campaign, which lasted until the NFC Wild Card Round at the hands of the Los Angeles Rams.His breakthrough gained him his initial Pro Bowl selection and a Second-Team All-Pro. As a reward for his performance, Minnesota signed him to a one-year, $23 million extension‚Äîa testament to their belief that Andrew Van Ginkel can lead the team further into the playoffs in 2025.Also read: Brad Pitt praises Chiefs as NFL dynasty on New Heights podcast with Kelce brothers As the new season of the NFL dawns, both Quinnen Williams and Andrew Van Ginkel will seek to expand on their recent success and propel their respective teams‚Äîone in rebuilding, one in contending‚Äîon the strength of top-tier defensive performance.
Article Summary: New york jets' quinnen williams and minnesota vikings' andrew van ginkel come in at no. 87 and no. 88 on esteemed nfl list in 2025. Both defenders won their spots through gritty reliability, standout statistics, and leadership on underperforming and high-functioning teams alike.

Article Title: Russell Wilson's wife Ciara‚Äôs ‚Äòclassic‚Äô pink Adidas outfit and bold hair change prove she‚Äôs still the ultimate style icon
Article Text:
Ciara stuns fans with bold new hairstyle and retro Adidas look (Getty Images)

Ciara wows fans in retro pink Adidas look, Russell Wilson can‚Äôt get enough



Ciara Wilson has long held the title of fashion risk-taker, and her latest retro-inspired transformation proves yet again why she's always one step ahead. The Grammy-winning artist recently turned heads with a bold throwback ensemble‚Äîrocking a pink ‚Äúclassic‚Äù Adidas track suit, complete with matching socks and heels. But it wasn‚Äôt just her outfit doing the talking; Ciara debuted a fresh, dramatic new hairstyle that elevated the entire look. And unsurprisingly, no one was more in awe than her husband, NFL star Russell Wilson Russell Wilson, now with the New York Giants, didn‚Äôt hold back his admiration. He publicly gushed over the post, showing the world once again how supportive he is of Ciara‚Äôs ever-evolving style. Whether she‚Äôs going full glam or embracing streetwear nostalgia, the singer-songwriter makes every look her runway‚Äîand Wilson is always front row, cheering her on.The 39-year-old entertainer has been on a style whirlwind lately. From outshining Wilson at a New York Knicks game in denim shorts to embracing regal vibes during a London trip, Ciara has been making fashion headlines. She recently turned a family WNBA outing into a pink-themed spectacle with a Yankees bunny hat, and her ripped-jean tribute look while hanging out with best friend Vanessa Bryant paid homage to the late Kobe Bryant in the most heartfelt way.On the music front, Ciara Wilson is just as unstoppable.Her upcoming album ‚ÄúCiCi‚Äù is set to drop on August 22, and fans are already vibing with the remix of her hit single ‚ÄúEcstacy‚Äù, which features powerful collaborations with Normani‚Äîfianc√©e of Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver DK Metcalf‚Äîand the multi-talented Teyana Taylor.Her latest Adidas look isn‚Äôt just a flash of nostalgic brilliance‚Äîit‚Äôs a reminder that Ciara‚Äôs fashion evolution is always in motion. She managed to give the vintage fit a thoroughly modern twist, proving that whether it‚Äôs retro, classic, contemporary, or completely out-of-the-box, she‚Äôs going to own it. And with the confidence she exudes, it‚Äôs no surprise fans and her husband alike can‚Äôt get enough.Every post, every appearance, every style choice adds another layer to the empire Ciara Wilson continues to build. Whether on the stage, red carpet, or courtside with her family, Queen Ciara is always showing up‚Äîand showing out.The couple, who tied the knot in a private ceremony in England back in 2016, marked their 9th wedding anniversary on July 6.Also Read: ‚ÄúHe isn't going to ask for her hand‚Äù: Travis Kelce holds off on proposing to Taylor Swift despite their strong and supportive relationship
Article Summary: Grammy-winning artist turned heads in retro adidas track suit. She also debuted a fresh, dramatic new hairstyle. Husband russell wilson publicly gushed over the look. The 39-year-old entertainer has been on a style whirlwind.

Article Title: Nikki Bella Hints at WWE Return, But Only If Sister Brie Joins Her in the Ring
Article Text:
Nikki Bella and Brie Garcia (Image Source: Getty)

Fans and family pushing for a Bella Twins return

‚ÄúWell, she better join me. I mean, it‚Äôs the only way I sometimes feel like I can win is if I have her,‚Äù

The road to Evolution 2 and a possible showdown

Nikki Bella is back in business when it comes to WWE, but the WWE Universe may not experience the true Bella Twins package. In a television interview recently, Nikki stated that while she is excited to return to the ring with her then-ex-WWE boyfriend, it still feels off since she does not have her twin sister, Brie Bella, alongside her. The duo has been attached at the hip inside and out of the ring for more than a decade, and fans have been clamoring for the reunion of the duo with a legacy.Nikki Bella, who is getting ready to enter the Women‚Äôs Battle Royal at Evolution 2, said something still seems to be off.she stated to F4Wonline.com. Nikki updated just how passionate the fanbase ‚Äî the Bella Army ‚Äî has been in wanting Brie to come back.Brie has not wrestled since the 2022 Women's Royal Rumble, but recently, there has been speculation of a potential twin return. And you know, we've had conversations, but nothing is done, Nikki said.Brie herself has observed that she hasn't been formally contacted about a return but remains open to anything interesting. Nikki indicated her preference for sharing the ring with her sister again, as both have always been known for their sisterly bond - the Bella Twins.Nikki is now turning her attention to Evolution 2, where she will be taking part in a high-stakes Women‚Äôs Battle Royal. The winner will also receive a title shot in WWE's next foreign affair, Clash in Paris. Former Divas Champion Nikki gives even more motivation, with Paris in her sights.Also Read: Nikki Bella's Net Worth in 2025, Current Salary, Contract Status and More Nikki was originally supposed to have a feud with Liv Morgan, but that was nixed when Morgan separated her shoulder. After Liv blindsided Nikki during a promo on Raw, WWE teased a Nikki vs. Liv feud once again despite the aforementioned setback, leading many to speculate that the grudge match could take place at Evolution 2.
Article Summary: Brie bella has not wrestled since the 2022 women's royal rumble, but recently, there has been speculation of a potential twin return. Nikki indicated her preference for sharing the ring with her sister again, as both have always been known for their sisterly bond - the bella twins.

Article Title: Savannah James shares powerful lesson on ‚Äòenoughness,‚Äô says it‚Äôs a work in progress
Article Text:
Savannah James, LeBron James' wife, recently shared her journey to self-satisfaction at her women's community platform, Let It Break. She emphasized the importance of self-discovery in finding 'enoughness,' contrasting her experience with her family's validation through sports. Unlike them, she found worth internally, a sentiment that resonated deeply with fans who praised her inspiring and down-to-earth nature.

Savannah James attributed self-discovery as a tool to find satisfaction with oneself

Savannah James poses with April McDaniel and Porsha Ellis, launched Let It Break with them (Image via @iamraisingwisdom/Instagram)

Fans poured love on Savannah James' video on 'Enoughness' (Source: Instagram)

It is easy to feel and get lost among family members who are famous NBA stars, but this does not apply to Savannah James. LeBron James ‚Äô better half took part in a meaningful discussion at her home-grown women‚Äôs community platform, Let It Break. In the discussion, she shared the secret to self-satisfaction and attributed it to finding ‚Äòenoughness‚Äô within oneself. Talking on a very important subject of staying satisfied with oneself, Savannah shared how she found her self-worth.As per Savannah, she had to go inward to find her ‚Äòenoughness.‚Äô She explained her journey was different from her family members in the sports field, who had a lot of validation from fans and followers. Unlike them, she was not showered with praise by her parents when they came to her sports events. So, she chose self-discovery as a means to affirm her worth.Savannah James has her own challenges. She addressed one of those challenges in the latest discussion at Let it Break, her community platform for women. A snippet of the same was posted on Let it Break‚Äôs official Instagram page. The topic of discussion that one can make out from the discussion was finding self-worth.Sharing her story, Savannah said:‚ÄúMy enoughness was definitely self-discovered. I don't feel like I had any cheering or any, like I play sports and you know my parents would come to my sports events and things like that, but like any type of like encouraging words of affirmation or you look so pretty or you did that, or whatever.. it was just like, ‚ÄúOkay cool, Good Job.‚ÄùShe continued, ‚ÄúYeah, so I had to find my enoughness in myself.‚ÄùThe other member said, ‚ÄúThat's I think, I mean, that's a work in progress.‚ÄùSavannah agreed, saying, ‚ÄúA work in progress, yeah, yeah, for sure.‚ÄùHere is the video:Her thoughts resonated deeply with the fans who watched the video. They appreciated Savannah and the video, calling her ‚Äòinspiring‚Äô and ‚Äòdown to earth‚Äô.A fan @italianbellala wrote a long note, saying, ‚ÄúLet me be a word of encouragement for you @mrs_savannahrj ‚ù§Ô∏è You are a role model of a parent, woman, and human. You not only represent what beauty looks like on the outside, but you represent what beauty looks like on the inside. You break all the barriers for women of color and women in general. Especially that you were a young mother and could have easily made things all about you. You put your family first. I admire your strength every day as it's not easy managing all that's tossed your way, yet you do it with finesse ‚ù§Ô∏èüëë‚ÄùAnother user @mom1_cmt2 commented, ‚ÄúTruueee! üíï‚ÄùSavannah‚Äôs fan @tpn_taste_of_love wrote, ‚ÄúSelf discovery is so much more appreciated. So glad you found your enough."Savannah James announced Let It Break women‚Äôs membership community in June 2024 with her friends, April McDaniel and Porsha Ellis. Her daughter, Zhuri, sparked in her the desire to discover herself. She found this platform to connect with other women and offer them a medium to voice their opinions and share their journey.Also Read: Savannah James shares glimpses from her daughter Zhuri‚Äôs lavish bedroom while making a hilarious claim
Article Summary: Savannah james, lebron james' wife, recently shared her journey to self-satisfaction at her women's community platform, let it break. She emphasized the importance of self-discovery in finding 'enoughness,' contrasting her experience with her family's validation through sports.

Article Title: Kevin Durant gives heartfelt credit to mom Wanda Durant for his stunning basketball career
Article Text:
Kevin Durant. Image via: KENA BETANCUR/AFP/Getty images

Kevin Durant honors his mom, Wanda Durant, as the true MVP behind his legendary basketball journey



The Truth About Kevin Durant's Nets Experience | LeBron James & Steve Nash | MIND THE GAME

Kevin Durant‚Äôs career has spanned legendary milestones. He has multiple NBA championships, Olympic gold medals, and MVP honors to his credit. Yet, despite all the global recognition and accolades, Durant made it clear that his journey wouldn‚Äôt have been possible without the unwavering belief of one person, his mother, Wanda Durant. In a personal conversation with LeBron James and Steve Nash on the Mind the Game podcast, the 36-year-old superstar opened up about how his mother's faith laid the foundation for everything he achieved on the court.Kevin Durant showed his immense gratitude to his mother, Wanda Durant in a candid chat with LeBron James and Steve Nash.‚ÄúYeah. It's my mom's for sure. I mean obviously it's always going to be your mom's. Yeah. But it's like I tune her out at a certain point. You know what I'm saying?‚Äù Durant shared, reflecting on his early years. ‚ÄúSo it was for sure. You know when I look back on it I for sure appreciated my mom telling me that I was going to be great. But I always knew that. Of course she going to say that.‚ÄùThe candid moment showed a side of Durant that fans rarely see as an elite athlete, shaped by a community and a mother who kept pushing him forward. ‚ÄúShe was calling me handsome when I was going to school and they was like, ‚ÄòOh no.‚ÄôYou know what I'm saying?‚Äù he continued, playfully acknowledging his mom‚Äôs unwavering support. ‚ÄúI was looking for some validation from my coaches, my teammates... then my friends start to knock on my door. Can Katie come play today?‚ÄùFrom those early neighborhood games to the NBA spotlight, Durant‚Äôs love for basketball was also nurtured by the community around him. ‚ÄúI was just grateful to have a rec center in my neighborhood that... provided a space for the kids. You know what I'm saying? And I was grateful. You know, most of my friends come from hooping... I travel this world because of that.‚ÄùFrom being drafted by the Seattle SuperSonics to winning two titles with the Warriors and now joining the Houston Rockets in a record-breaking seven-team deal, Durant's career continues to evolve. ‚ÄúHouston, Can‚Äôt Wait!‚Äù he wrote on social media. But at every stage, Wanda Durant‚Äôs influence remains a central force.As Rockets coach Ime Udoka said, ‚ÄúHis skill level, love of basketball, and dedication to his craft have made him one of the most respected players of his generation.‚ÄùAlso Read: Los Angeles Lakers $10 billion deal left Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal ‚Äúupset‚Äù for one major reason Today, without a doubt, Durant is one of the most accomplished NBA stars in the league with his elite status in the league. While his tenure with the Rockets is yet to be seen, fans expect his showdown with his new franchise as well.
Article Summary: Kevin durant opened up about his mother, wanda durant, on the mind the game podcast. The nba star said he appreciated his mom telling him he was going to be great. Durant's love for basketball was also nurtured by the community around him.

Article Title: Golden State Warriors hold back major moves as Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler await Giannis decision
Article Text:
Golden State Warriors hold back major moves as Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler await Giannis decision (Image Source: Getty Images)

Giannis Antetokounmpo‚Äôs decision timeline may delay Golden State Warriors‚Äô next move

Golden State Warrior faces trade pressure as Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler age

Golden State Warriors hold back major moves as Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler await Giannis decision (Image Source: Getty Images)

Also Read:

A hush has fallen over the Golden State Warriors as fans and commentators watch closely this offseason. Rumors swirl around NBA star Giannis Antetokounmpo , but no clear direction has surfaced. Meanwhile, the Warriors are staying quiet, even as whispers grow louder. With superstars Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler nearing their peak years, many wonder if the Golden State Warriors will act fast or wait on what could be a game-changing opportunity.On July 6, NBA insider Ramona Shelburne appeared on NBA Today to offer a key update on Giannis Antetokounmpo‚Äôs future. Shelburne said that Giannis may take until August or even September to decide if he will request a trade from the Milwaukee Bucks. She added, ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think anything will be decided on his end until August, September‚Äù.At the same time, the Warriors have held steady. No major signings. No big trades. Behind closed doors, they are standing guard. With Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler still in the prime of their careers, the organization is preparing, but staying patient. If Giannis does make a move, Golden State wants to be ready with all cards in their hand.The wait is a gamble. The longer the Warriors hold off, the more likely they miss other key chances.Stephen Curry, now nearing 37, and Jimmy Butler, 35, have two or three years of peak performance left. Golden State‚Äôs front office knows this. If Giannis decides to leave the Milwaukee Bucks, Curry and Butler‚Äôs final championship run may hinge on swift action.Still, there is a risk. If the Warriors act too late, either in free agency or minor trades, the value of their draft picks and role players could disappear. In season after season, every pick and rotation player adds up.Analysts believe the Bucks' decision to waive Damian Lillard and bring in Myles Turner could influence Giannis Antetokounmpo to remain in Milwaukee. However, as Ramona Shelburne pointed out, ‚Äúa decision like that usually comes later in the summer.‚ÄùThe Warriors‚Äô offseason silence signals confidence, but also tension. Fans worldwide know the stakes. With every day that passes, the clock keeps ticking on what could be the biggest acquisition in NBA history all depending on one man‚Äôs choice.
Article Summary: Golden state warriors hold back major moves as stephen curry and jimmy butler await giannis decision. Nba insider ramona shelburne said that giannis may take until august or even september to decide if he will request a trade from the milwaukee bucks. The warriors‚Äô offseason silence signals confidence, but also tension.

Article Title: Donovan Mitchell sends seven‚Äëword tweet to Josh Hart, sparking New York sports buzz
Article Text:
Donovan Mitchel at Miami Heat for Playoffs (Image via Imagn)

Cleveland Cavaliers star Donovan Mitchell

The Context: Subway Series Banter Between Mitchell and Josh Hart

The Impact: Knicks Fans React and Trade Speculation

The Players‚Äô New York Connections

Broader NBA and Fan Engagement

In the world of professional basketball, social media often serves as a lively arena for players to engage in friendly banter, showcase their personalities, and connect with fans beyond the court. Recently,sparked excitement among New York Knicks supporters by sending a succinct seven-word message to a Knicks fan favorite on social media, igniting a wave of reactions and speculation.The exchange occurred amid the intense New York Subway Series baseball games between the New York Mets and the New York Yankees. Josh Hart, a prominent player for the Knicks and a Yankees supporter, tweeted his allegiance to the Yankees despite the Mets winning two out of three games in the series. Hart‚Äôs tweet emphasized that New York remains a "Yankees city," a nod to the storied baseball franchise‚Äôs enduring popularity in the city. Donovan Mitchell , a lifelong Mets fan with deep family ties to the organization‚Äîhis father having been a manager and hitting coach‚Äîresponded to Hart‚Äôs tweet with a playful jab. Mitchell‚Äôs seven-word message read: **"Saying this down 6 is funny üòÇ #LFGM"**, referencing the Mets‚Äô commanding six-run lead during one of the games.This lighthearted social media interaction quickly caught the attention of Knicks fans, many of whom flooded the comments urging Mitchell to join their team. The prospect of Mitchell donning the Knicks‚Äô orange and blue sparked enthusiasm, given his status as a six-time NBA All-Star and a dynamic scorer. However, despite the fan fervor, there appears to be little practical momentum for such a trade. Mitchell is thriving with the Cleveland Cavaliers, and the Knicks have firmly positioned Jalen Brunson as their franchise cornerstone.Both Mitchell and Hart share strong New York roots, though their sports loyalties differ. Hart‚Äôs connection to the Yankees is personal and historic; he was gifted a Yankees jersey in honor of his great uncle, Elston Howard, the first Black player for the franchise. Meanwhile, Mitchell‚Äôs Mets fandom is lifelong, adding a layer of authenticity to his playful taunts during the Subway Series.This episode exemplifies how NBA players use social media to engage with fans and each other in ways that transcend basketball. Mitchell‚Äôs witty seven-word tweet not only entertained followers but also highlighted the vibrant sports culture in New York, where basketball and baseball loyalties intertwine. It also underscores the camaraderie and competitive spirit among NBA stars, who often blend sports talk with personal pride and humor.Also read: NBA Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could be chasing $251,019,650 Washington Wizards superstar to form Big 3 with LeBron James and Luka Doncic In conclusion, Donovan Mitchell‚Äôs brief but pointed seven-word message to Knicks fan favorite Josh Hart on social media was more than just a playful jab‚Äîit was a reflection of sports passion, city pride, and the engaging personalities that make professional athletes beloved figures both on and off the court. While the Knicks-Metropolitan rivalry continues on the baseball diamond, Mitchell and Hart‚Äôs exchange provided a memorable moment of cross-sport banter that delighted fans and added another chapter to New York‚Äôs rich sports narrative.
Article Summary: Donovan mitchell sparked excitement among new york knicks supporters by sending a succinct seven-word message to a knicks fan favorite on social media. The exchange occurred amid the intense new york subway series baseball games between the new york mets and new york yankees.

Article Title: Los Angeles Lakers kick off secret 2025 trade talks for Matisse Thybulle, Marcus Smart & Ayo Dosunmu
Article Text:
Los Angeles Lakers begin secret 2025 trade talks for Matisse Thybulle, Marcus Smart and Ayo Dosunmu (Image Source: Getty Images)



Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô early interest sparks trade buzz ahead of key offseason decisions

Who the Los Angeles Lakers are eyeing and why these names matter for 2025



The Los Angeles Lakers are quietly making moves behind the scenes, and the NBA offseason is accelerating quickly. Although no agreements have been reached as yet, the staff is supposedly investigating several trade possibilities. According to NBA insider Anthony Irwin, the Lakers have expressed interest in three players: Matisse Thybulle, Ayo Dosunmu, and Marcus Smart. These first discussions might influence the following actions of the team as they get ready for the 2025‚Äì26 season.NBA trade talks often heat up quietly before any official moves are made. This week, new whispers from the Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô front office are catching attention across the league. On July 7, NBA reporter Anthony Irwin posted on X that the Lakers have shown early interest in Matisse Thybulle, Ayo Dosunmu, and Marcus Smart. These players may become part of the team‚Äôs next phase of roster improvements.No deals are done yet. But these players are now on the Lakers' radar. Reporter Anthony Irwin says the Lakers have started early talks with teams. They asked about the players‚Äô availability and price.This shows the Los Angeles Lakers may want better defense in the backcourt. They could also be looking to add depth to their bench before the 2025‚Äì26 season begins.Irwin shared:‚ÄúSources say Matisse Thybulle, Marcus Smart (though most teams are watching to see if he's going to be bought out), Ayo Dosunmu and others are names the Lakers have had preliminary conversations with teams about availability and price, though no offers have been made.‚ÄùMatisse Thybulle plays for the Portland Trail Blazers. He plays shooting guard and small forward. He is known for his strong defense. The Lakers may want him to guard top scorers.Marcus Smart is a veteran guard. He played for the Boston Celtics and now plays for the Memphis Grizzlies. He is tough on defense and a strong leader. As of July 7, teams are watching to see if he will be bought out. If he is, the Lakers can sign him without a trade.Ayo Dosunmu plays for the Chicago Bulls. He is 24 years old. He is fast, young, and plays hard. He plays both offense and defense. The Lakers may like his energy and youth.No trade offers have been made yet. The Lakers are only talking to teams for now. These talks show they want to fix their team after losing in the playoffs.Also Read: Draymond Green unleashes explosive truth as NBA free agency chaos hits 2025 offseason This comes shortly after the 2025 NBA Draft. Training camp will start in September. The Lakers don‚Äôt have much money to spend. They may need to find smart ways to add players.More news should come as free agency and trades continue through July.
Article Summary: Los angeles lakers begin secret 2025 trade talks for matisse thybulle, marcus smart and ayo dosunmu. Reporter anthony irwin says the lakers have started early talks with teams. They asked about the players' availability and price. This shows the los angeles lakers may want better defense in the backcourt.

Article Title: Patrick Mahomes lauds rookie Cooper Flagg, says he has bright future with Dallas Mavericks
Article Text:
Patrick Mahomes (via Getty Images)

Patrick Mahomes speaks about believing in Cooper Flagg's potential with Dallas Mavericks



Patrick Mahomes on His Mentality This Season, Advice From Tom Brady, DEEPEST WR Core & NFL Top 100!

Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes knows what it takes to play at the top of his game‚Äîand he thinks Cooper Flagg of the Dallas Mavericks possesses that same gift. Recently, discussing Cooper Flagg's entry into the NBA, Mahomes offered the 18-year-old rookie genuine support and optimism about making an impact in Dallas.The Super Bowl champion, who knows pressure and expectations all too well, spoke about his respect for Cooper Flagg when he appeared on Up & Adams with Kay Adams. A longtime fan of the Dallas Mavericks, Patrick Mahomes commented on Cooper Flagg's potential and what his signing could do for the franchise's future.While the Dallas Mavericks prepare for the new NBA season, Cooper Flagg keeps getting the headlines as the league's most promising rookie. His basketball IQ, confidence, and talent have already caught the eyes of top athletes, most specifically, Patrick Mahomes, who didn't mind expressing his endorsement.‚ÄúSo I'm like a very low-key Duke fan,‚Äù Patrick Mahomes said. ‚ÄúI was growing up... JJ Redick, Sheldon Williams... but obviously I'm a Texas Tech fan now. So I watched Cooper Flagg last year. Great player, and I was extremely excited for him to come to the Mavs.Once they get healthy, they'll have as good of a chance as anybody of taking home the championship... I still love my guy Luka, no matter what. I'll be rooting for him no matter what, but my Mavs got a chance, man‚Äîwe‚Äôve got some hope again in Dallas. ‚ÄùA regular at Mavericks games, Mahomes will no doubt be a familiar presence on the bench, observing Flagg's development in real time.Also read: Can the NFL‚Äôs New Dynasty King Patrick Mahomes snatch the GOAT Crown ‚Äî or will Tom Brady reign on At a mere 18 years old, Cooper Flagg is walking into a glare that few are prepared for‚Äîbut judging by is sharing Mahomes' gut instincts, Dallas may have discovered a star in the making. With guidance from veteran athletes and an ardent fan community, Flagg's first season will be watched keenly‚Äîand possibly revolutionize the game.
Article Summary: Patrick mahomes is a longtime fan of the dallas mavericks. The kansas city chiefs quarterback believes cooper flagg has the potential to be a star in the nba. Mahomes believes the mavs have a good chance of winning the championship this season.

Article Title: Travis Kelce‚Äôs 2024 season questioned as Eric Mangini cites Taylor Swift relationship and media for mediocre performance
Article Text:
Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift (via Getty Images)

Off-field obligations possibly distracted Travis Kelce, says Eric Mangini



Inside Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's SURPRISE Ohio Lunch Date

Kansas City Chiefs charismatic tight end Travis Kelce has become a headline attraction both on and off the field. His football legacy remains firmly in place, but questions are beginning to arise about whether his increasingly long list of non-football activities‚Äîhis highly publicized romance with Taylor Swift among them‚Äîhas started to intrude his game. Former Cleveland Browns head coach Eric Mangini recently weighed in on Kelce's up-and-down 2024 season, speculating that the NFL superstar possibly overextended himself.Guesting on The Breakfast Ball Show, Eric Mangini had a refreshingly blunt analysis of what could have caused Travis Kelce's slump in performance, specifically Super Bowl LIX, where the Chiefs somehow managed to defeat the Philadelphia Eagles, but Travis Kelce's contribution on the field was dismal in comparison with his expectations. Avoiding any explicit mention of Taylor Swift, Eric Mangini hinted that Travis Kelce's focus might have moved too much away from football at an inopportune juncture in his career.‚ÄúWhen you look at his offseason last year, it was filled with everything but football. So, he's got the budding romance, he's on tour, he's traveling overseas, and all that stuff, which is great. Then he's got the TV show. So, he films the TV show. Good with that, too. Then he's got the podcast,‚Äù Eric Mangini said, referring to Travis Kelce's busy schedule, which featured TV show appearances, international travel, and podcast hosting."He's got the new romance, he's on tour, he's overseas traveling‚Ä¶ which is wonderful. Then he records a television show. Then he's got the podcast. It's a lot."While Mangini stressed he didn't blame Kelce for taking career opportunities beyond the NFL, he did say the all-time great might have stayed focused just short enough to be a factor in his game. ‚ÄúI'm not angry at him taking advantage of the opportunities, but I do think that put him a little bit behind the eight-ball going into the season," he added.Fanning the media fire are the persistent speculations on Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift's rumored engagement. Per a Daily Mail news item, the all-star tight end might be holding out for a low-key moment‚Äîaway from football season‚Äîto pounce. Meanwhile, insiders indicate the couple is having increasingly private moments together during Swift's hiatus from her Eras Tour.Also read: Travis Kelce puts Taylor Swift on the back burner, vows to ‚Äúdo anything‚Äù for a Super Bowl win As the 2025 NFL season approaches, everyone will be watching Kelce. Whether he can refocus and regain his best form remains to be determined, but talk about priorities isn't going to fade any time soon.
Article Summary: Former cleveland browns head coach eric mangini speculates that travis kelce may have overextended himself. Mangini says kelce's offseason was filled with everything but football. The all-star tight end might have stayed focused just short enough to be a factor in his game.

Article Title: NBA Trade Rumors: Cleveland Cavaliers might re-sign Kevin Love as LeBron James rumors
Article Text:
Kevin Love stuns NBA fans with Utah Jazz move as LeBron James reunion hopes take a hit (Image via Getty Images)

Kevin Love : From Trade Chip to Potential Homecoming

Why Cleveland Makes Sense for Kevin Love

The LeBron James Factor: Rumors Run Wild

Kevin Love of Miami Heat (Image Credit: Getty Images)

What Would a Love-LeBron Reunion Mean for Cleveland?

Championship Pedigree

Locker Room Dynamics

On-Court Fit

The Realities: Hype vs. Hope

The NBA offseason is always a hotbed of speculation, but few stories capture the imagination of Cleveland Cavaliers fans quite like the prospect of a reunion with Kevin Love‚Äîespecially as whispers about LeBron James ‚Äôs future continue to swirl. Could the Cavaliers be on the verge of reuniting their 2016 championship core? Let‚Äôs break down the latest developments, what they mean for the Cavs, and why fans are buzzing with excitement and nostalgia.Kevin Love, a key member of the Cavaliers‚Äô 2016 title team, recently found himself moved in a three-team trade to the Utah Jazz. But his stay in Salt Lake City may be short-lived, as the Jazz are widely expected to buy out the veteran forward, making him a free agent with the freedom to choose his next destination.- Leadership & Experience: Love‚Äôs impact goes beyond the box score. He‚Äôs a respected locker room presence, mentor, and former champion‚Äîqualities invaluable to a Cavs team with playoff aspirations.- Fan Favorite: Few players are as beloved in Cleveland as Love. His return would electrify the fanbase and bring a wave of nostalgia from the 2016 championship run.- Low Risk, High Reward: At 37, Love isn‚Äôt expected to play heavy minutes.But on a veteran minimum deal, his leadership and three-point shooting could be a strategic asset off the bench.> ‚ÄúHis impact off the floor is amazing. Here‚Äôs a great person, advocate, coach/player and can help everyone on this team trying to make that push to be a title winner like Love was in 2016.‚Äù ‚Äî Zach Shafron, local reporterNo discussion of Cavaliers reunions is complete without mentioning LeBron James . The King‚Äôs future is, as always, the subject of intense speculation. Here‚Äôs what we know:- Player Option Picked Up: LeBron has opted into his contract for the 2025‚Äì26 season, ensuring he‚Äôll play a 23rd NBA season. However, this doesn‚Äôt guarantee he‚Äôll remain with the Lakers, as trade rumors‚Äîespecially involving the Warriors and even a Cleveland return‚Äîcontinue to circulate.- Cleveland Connections: While a LeBron return to the Cavs faces financial and logistical hurdles, the mere possibility has fans and analysts dreaming of a storybook reunion‚Äîespecially if Love is also back in wine and gold.- Lakers and Warriors in the Mix: The Lakers are reportedly open to roster changes, and the Warriors have previously shown interest in acquiring LeBron. The Mavericks have also been mentioned as a dark-horse destination if a buyout occurs.Bringing back Love‚Äîand potentially LeBron‚Äîwould instantly boost the Cavs‚Äô credibility as contenders. Both are battle-tested veterans who know what it takes to win at the highest level.- Mentorship: Young stars like Donovan Mitchell and Evan Mobley could benefit immensely from Love‚Äôs and LeBron‚Äôs experience.- Culture: The 2016 Cavs were known for their chemistry and resilience. Reuniting key pieces could help recapture that magic.- Love: Stretch big, floor spacer, and rebounder‚Äîperfect for spot minutes and as a locker room leader.- LeBron: Even at 39, LeBron remains one of the league‚Äôs top playmakers and could elevate the Cavs to true contender status if a trade or buyout somehow materializes.While the emotional appeal is undeniable, there are practical considerations:- Love‚Äôs Role: At this stage, Love is best suited for a limited role, providing leadership and shooting off the bench.- LeBron‚Äôs Contract: LeBron‚Äôs $52.6 million salary and the Cavs‚Äô cap situation make a trade difficult under the current CBA.- Roster Construction: The Cavs must decide whether to prioritize veteran presence or continue developing their young core.The prospect of a Kevin Love reunion in Cleveland is more than just a feel-good story‚Äîit‚Äôs a move that could provide tangible benefits for a Cavs team on the rise. As for LeBron James, the rumors may be swirling, but for now, they remain just that‚Äîrumors. Still, in an NBA landscape where anything can happen, Cavaliers fans can dare to dream of one more magical run with their championship heroes.Also read: Donovan Mitchell‚Äôs Seven-Word Tweet to Knicks Star Josh Hart Ignites New York Sports Buzz and Fan Speculation One thing is certain: the 2025 NBA offseason in Cleveland is shaping up to be as entertaining as any game on the court.
Article Summary: Kevin love recently found himself moved in a three-team trade to the utah jazz. But his stay in salt lake city may be short-lived, as the jazz are widely expected to buy out the veteran forward. Lebron james has opted into his contract for the 2025‚Äì26 season, ensuring he‚Äôll play a 23rd nba season.

Article Title: ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs just a nepo baby‚Äù: Bronny James‚Äô Summer League performance sparks heated debate among NBA fans
Article Text:
Bronny James' recent performance has sparked a lot of criticism.(Image via Al Bello/Getty)

Bronny James‚Äô performance against the Miami Heat attracted a lot of criticism



Fans are furious at Bronny James' recent performance.(Image via X)

Bronny James, one of the youngest players in the NBA and son of NBA icon LeBron James , has attracted a lot of attention ever since he started playing. While the young player has gotten a lot of criticism as many fans have felt he has ‚Äúundue advantage‚Äù, his recent performance has raised eyebrows again.Recently, Bronny James was spotted playing against the Miami Heat in the NBA Summer League. The 20 year old took the ball from the Heats‚Äô Kasparas Jakuƒçionis and was spotted finishing off with a one handed dunk, and now, fans are divided on this.While many fans are impressed by Bronny James‚Äô performance, others have called him out on the ‚Äúhype‚Äù around him.A fan by the username @TheHurricaneBen took to X and wrote, ‚ÄúBelieve me... we ain't moved by "Year 2 Bronny"‚Äù, while another fan by the username @amateurstake commented,‚ÄúThis is ridiculous üòÇhe can‚Äôt be evaluated until he faces the best the league has to offer in situations that matter.‚ÄùA third fan by the username @mhollaecu88 wrote, ‚ÄúGood job for him but the nba has to stop this, bro double dribbled and then they want us to watch this bs smh‚Äù.Another fan by the username @ColumbusMa38380 wrote, ‚ÄúA walk and double dribble all while wearing pink tennis shoes in a purple and gold uniform. I wouldn‚Äôt call that üî•.‚ÄùA fifth fan by the username @frappharden posted, ‚ÄúWell, maybe he‚Äôll actually get some f**king buckets this year ass Nepo, baby‚Äù.Despite the criticism, Bronny James‚Äô father, LeBron James has always made sure to celebrate his son‚Äôs achievements and has even defended him.A few months ago, LeBron James was spotted confronting famous host Stephen A. Smith for the criticising his son, Bronny James, ‚Äúconstantly‚Äù.Last month, Stephen A. Smith opened up about it and said, "He hid behind his son, tried to make something out of nothing, as if I was dogging his son, which I was not. The real issue was we don't like each other. And he used that as an excuse to confront me," Smith claimed. "I got it."Also Read: ‚ÄúI felt a bit more naked‚Äù: Dwyane Wade‚Äôs wife Gabrielle Union opened up about her sexual assault and its impact on her marriage to the NBA legend
Article Summary: Bronny james' recent performance has sparked a lot of criticism. The 20-year-old was spotted playing against the miami heat in the nba summer league. While many fans are impressed by bronny james‚Äô performance, others have called him out on the ‚Äúhype‚Äô around him.

Article Title: Dwight Howard facing divorce as wife Amy Luciani ends their marriage early
Article Text:
Dwight Howard was in Philadelphia 76ers (Image via Getty Images)

Dwight Howard‚Äôs $200M empire at risk as wife files for divorce without prenup

Dwight Howard is also called the Superman (Image via Getty Images)

Just six months after getting married to the NBA legend Dwight Howard, Amber Rose Howard, also known as Amy Luciani, filed for divorce on Monday, July 7, 2025. According to a report by EURWeb, irreconcilable issues were the cause of their divorce. She further requested that all marital goods and assets be "equitably divided" as per the laws. She asked for alimony as well.According to court records that TMZ Sports was able to get, on July 1, the reality star went to a Georgia judge and asked for a divorce from the basketball player. As stated by Amy Howard in the document:"The marriage is irretrievably broken‚Ä¶ There are no prospects for reconciliation."Additionally, she seemed to have deleted all ties to the NBA legend from her social media accounts. Their relationship has been scrutinised and trending on social media since the much-publicised problems with the player's ex-partner. Royce Reed, Dwight Howard 's ex-girlfriend, allegedly accused him of verbal, physical, and emotional abuse in an Instagram post, according to a report in Vibe.The ongoing controversy surrounding Dwight's lawsuit, in which he acknowledged having s*x with men, also caused a sensation. The internet was in a frenzy over the astonishing court confessions made in that lawsuit. It was filed by a guy who accused Dwight of s*xual assault. Dwight denied the assault and maintained that the actions were consensual, but the whole thing exposed his private life.The Detroit-born rapper kept her relationship with Dwight Howard a secret until formally announcing their engagement in December 2024.On Instagram, Amy Luciani shared the news. In a since-deleted post with a video, she flaunted her diamond engagement ring while out at a club with her partner. In the group of pictures taken at the time, they were both wearing diamond rings.Meanwhile, Dwight Howard now might find himself in a tight spot financially since Amy Luciani has filed for divorce. Without a prenuptial agreement in effect, Georgia courts may decide that his soon-to-be ex-wife will receive a fair share of the assets. She might also continue getting the financial help mentioned in the paperwork. The stakes are very high given the player‚Äôs lengthy NBA career, which included contracts worth over $200 million.Also read: Kevin Durant and Steve Nash revealed big issues with small guards in modern NBA games
Article Summary: Amber rose howard, also known as amy luciani, filed for divorce on monday, july 7, 2025. According to a report by eurweb, irreconcilable issues were the cause of their divorce. She further requested that all marital goods and assets be "equitably divided" as per the laws.

Article Title: Alex Bregman‚Äôs brother AJ proposes to model Lauren Melo in a perfect romantic moment
Article Text:
Image Source: lauren.xo.ashley/Instagram

A.J. Bregman proposes to Lauren Melo in an emotional winery setting

, ‚ÄúBeyond excited to spend forever with you,‚Äù

‚ÄúI can‚Äôt wait to marry the love of my life, here‚Äôs to forever.‚Äù

Family reacts as A.J. and Lauren celebrate their engagement

Famous Boston Red Sox star Alex Bregman isn‚Äôt the only one in the spirit of love today ‚Äî his younger brother, Anthony ‚ÄúA.J.‚Äù Bregman, just got engaged.
